name: Christie
title: The Elegant Assassin
subtitle: A deadly fighter who combines grace and lethal precision
lore: A master of the She Quan fighting style, Christie is an elite assassin who moves with deadly grace. Her refined appearance masks a ruthless fighter capable of executing precise and devastating attacks. She uses her acrobatic skills and deadly techniques to eliminate any who stand in her way.

passive.name: Monteiro Momentum
passive.description: Christie gains [10%] bonus movement speed for [4.5s] after hitting with any ability.

Q.name: Dynamic Rhythm
Q.description: 3 charges [0.8s cd/use]: 1-2 charges: Christie kicks in front of her, dealing [45/85/155/240/300] damage per hit. 3rd charge: Christie performs a powerful kick, dealing [80/170/300/505/690] damage and stunning enemies for [0.65s]. The ability charges and goes on cooldown simultaneously if not used within [3s].

W.name: Samba Slam
W.description: While dancing, Christie thrusts forward and knocks up enemies in front of her for [0.85s], dealing [70/90/185/230/350] damage.

E.name: Go Easy On Me!
E.description: Christie charms all enemies in front of her for [1s], causing them to take [30%/30%/35%/35%/40%/50%] increased damage from Christie during the effect.

R.name: Carnival Toss
R.description: Christie leaps in the specified direction. If she catches an enemy, she grabs and throws them a long distance in the direction of the leap. Additionally, she deals [17% MAXHP] damage to them. Now grants a shield equal to 8% of damage dealt over 6s

1.name: Agile Strikes
1.description: Christie's Q ability now applies a [20%] slow for [1s] on each hit.

1.name: Quickened Earthshatter
1.description: All of Christie's abilities lose [1s cd]

1.name: Damage Quest
1.description: Quest: Deal 8500 damage with Q -> Christie's Q ability gains an additional [15%] damage.

5.name: Enhanced Momentum
5.description: Christie's Passive now grants [15%] bonus movement speed for [4s] after hitting with any ability.

5.name: Combo Master
5.description: Each Q hit reduces the cooldown of her W, E and R ability by [1s]

5.name: Swift Dance
5.description: Item: Upon activation, Christie doubles her movement speed for [1.35s]

10.name: Wall Impact
10.description: R: If the thrown enemy hit a wall, they take additional [350/450/650] damage.

10.name: Mass Toss
10.description: R: Christie can grab any number of enemies at the same time.

15.name: Level 1 Mastery
15.description: You gain all level 1 talents and complete the quest.

15.name: CC Follow-up
15.description: Christie now deals [20%] more damage to CC-d targets.

15.name: Weakening Strikes
15.description: Christie's Q lowers the damage of the damaged target by [4%] for each hit for [3s].

20.name: Talent Mastery
20.description: Christie gains all her previous talent options, but loses the chosen ones.

20.name: CC Hunter
20.description: Christie moves [40%] faster towards CC-d enemies.

20.name: Extra Charge
20.description: Christie gains an additional weak Q charge after the 3rd charge.

20.name: Enhanced Slam
20.description: Christie's W ability range is increased massively and its duration is up by [0.75s].
